original_text: The fifth angel made a sound with his trumpet. Then I saw a star that had fallen down from the sky to the earth. Someone gave a key to that star. The key could open the entrance to the deep hole.
korean_text: 다섯째 천사가 나팔을 불매 내가 보니 하늘에서 땅에 떨어진 별 하나가 있는데 그가 무저갱의 열쇠를 받았더라

sentences.original_text: The fifth angel made a sound with his trumpet.
sentences.korean_translation: 다섯 번째 천사가 나팔로 소리를 냈습니다.

sentences.original_text: that had fallen down from the sky to the earth.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 별은 하늘에서 땅으로 떨어져 내렸습니다.

sentences.original_text: Someone gave a key to that star.
The key could open the entrance to the deep hole.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 열쇠는 깊은 구멍의 입구를 열 수 있었습니다.
